meanings.definition: A form of color blindness in which the ability to perceive green light is impaired.
meanings.sent1: His deuteranopia made it challenging for him to differentiate between green and red.
meanings.sent2: People with deuteranopia may struggle to see the vibrant colors of nature.
meanings.sent3: During the art class, his deuteranopia caused a hilarious mix-up between green and red paint.
meanings.sent4: Her deuteranopia turned the traffic lights into a confusing puzzle of colors.
meanings.sent5: The world through deuteranopia eyes lacks the richness of green landscapes.

meanings.definition: The condition of being unable to distinguish between shades of green and red.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that his deuteranopia meant he couldn't see the difference between green and red hues.
meanings.sent2: In a garden full of flowers, deuteranopia can make it hard to appreciate the variety of colors.
meanings.sent3: At the fruit market, her deuteranopia led to a mix-up between ripe red apples and green pears.
meanings.sent4: His deuteranopia turned the traffic lights into a confusing blend of colors.
meanings.sent5: The world of a person with deuteranopia is like a painting missing the vibrant greens and reds.
